Title: The Boys in the Band
Plot: Nina is dating the lead guitar player of Finch and Kevin's new ""air band"" and convinces him to quit the group.  Meanwhile, Jack's rivalry with Alan Thicke drives both of them to therapy with their daughters.
GuestStars: Alan Thicke, Huey Lewis, Jim O'Heir, CC DeVille, Leeza Gibbons, Molly Murphy, Wally Wingert, Brian Kaiser, Arturo Gil, Gabriel Pimental, Martin Klebba, Joe Grffo
